Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: assume this is for post 1.0, if so, please mark fixVersion as "Future" thanks

Action.author: grapebaba
Action.body: ~yacovm I am interested in this task. Would you like point the LOC I can instrument these metrics collection?

Action.author: grapebaba
Action.body: I mean since it need collect amount of messages in memory, amount of messages discarded due to comm buffer overflows, blocks that are disseminated, I want to know which files I can find useful information.

Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: So actually we have already started working on it, if we would need assistance I will let you know ;)

Action.author: c0rwin
Action.body: This ticket will be handled as part of the effort for FAB-12727.
